paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: stage IV HER-2 positive breast cancer, stage II TN breast cancer

functional_data.summary: Mutations in BRCA2 were found in PC-B-148CA cells related to drug resistance.

variants.additional_notes: No specific penetrance data or individual case details were provided.
key_quotes: the mutations of BRCA1/2, KIT, PIK3CA, SMAD4, and TP53 were found in PC-B-142CA cells related to the resistance of several drugs
PC-B-148CA had mutated BRCA2, NRAS and TP53

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was mentioned without detailed penetrance data.
